giveaway.name: giveaway
giveaway.description:
**commands for the usage and management of giveaways**
	<:Reply:986293903131050045>!! mangyaring tandaan na ang (mga) utos na ito ay kasalukuyang nasa proseso ng pagsasaayos, at wala pa sa pangwakas nitong anyo
	<:Reply:986293903131050045>!! maaaring magkaroon ng mga pagbabago sa mga utos na ito nang walang pahintulot o anumang abiso
	<:Reply:986293903131050045>!! sumangguni sa mga opisyal na pahayag ng tagapagdebelop ukol dito para sa karagdagang impormasyon

help.name: help
help.description: **shows help information about bot commands and command categories**

message.name: message
message.description: **sends a private message to a user**
message.options:
• **ID of recepient**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang *user ID* ng isang *Discord user*
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>example: `527828928803373065`
		• **mensahe**
		ang mensahe na ipadadala sa tinukoy na user

poll.name: poll
poll.description: **makes a poll wherein users can vote through message reactions**

profile.name: profile
profile.description: **shows the profile of a Discord user**
profile.options:
• **ID**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang *user ID* ng isang *Discord user* (example: `527828928803373065`)
		• **Mention**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>isang pagbanggit o *mention* sa isang Discord user
		• **Tag**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang tag ng isang Discord user na binubuo ng kaniyang pangalan at *discriminator*
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>example: `renz#6270`

purge.name: purge
purge.description: **deletes a specified number of messages from a channel**
purge.options:
• **number**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang bilang ng mensahe na buburahin mula sa channel
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang bilang na ito ay kinakailangang hindi bababa sa `2` at hindi tataas sa `99`

settings.name: settings
settings.description: **shows the bot's settings for the current server**

choose.name: choose
choose.description: **chooses one from a specified pool of objects**
choose.options:
• **choices**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang mga opsyon na pagpipilian
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>nakahiwalay ang bawat opsyon sa isa't isa sa pamamagitan ng mga kuwit (`,`)

hangman.name: hangman
hangman.description:
**play a game of hangman**

		__**How to Play**__
		The main goal is to find the hidden word, phrase, or sentence.
		The game ends once the hidden word/phrase/sentence has been guessed.
		Players will earn points depending on the number of letters that they were able to reveal.

		__**Gamemodes**__
		:man: **Solo**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>One player. The bot thinks of a hidden word. The player will guess the word.
		:crossed_swords: **Duo** `Version 2.1+`
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>Two players. Players must come up with a hidden word that must be guessed by the other player.
hangman.options:
• **"start"**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>start a game of hangman
		• **"stop"**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>stops the game of hangman that you have started

howbanal.description:
**measures how holy a user is**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>maaari mo ring hayaang walang nakalagay sa utos na ito upang masukat ang iyong sarili
howbanal.options:
• **ID**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang *user ID* ng isang *Discord user* (example: `527828928803373065`)
		• **Mention**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>isang pagbanggit o *mention* sa isang Discord user
		• **Tag**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang tag ng isang Discord user na binubuo ng kaniyang pangalan at *discriminator*
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>example: `renz#6270`

omikuji.name: omikuji
omikuji.description: **lets you choose a random omikuji, which can then be used to tell your fortune in various aspects of life**

penis.name: penis
penis.description:
**measures the length of the user's penis**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>maaari mo ring hayaang walang nakalagay sa utos na ito upang masukat ang iyong sarili
penis.options:
• **ID**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang *user ID* ng isang *Discord user* (example: `527828928803373065`)
		• **Pagbanggit**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>isang pagbanggit o *mention* sa isang Discord user
		• **Tag**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang tag ng isang Discord user na binubuo ng kaniyang pangalan at *discriminator*
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>example: `renz#6270`

renz.name: renz
renz.options:
• **add <name> | <[message] | [image]> | [description]**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>magdagdag ng isang custom na utos
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>example: `renz dagdag sheesh | *sheeshhh* | https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/852816062689181716/984170362617073745/sheesh.gif | SHEESH`
		**-** *name* - ang pangalan ng custom na utos na idaragdag
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ito ang ginagamit upang magamit ang utos
		**-** *message* - ang mensahe o mga salita na ipinakikita sa paggamit ng utos
		**-** *image* - ang link ng imahe na ipinakikita sa paggamit ng utos
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>maaari ring i-*attach* ang larawan na gagamitin para sa utos
		**-** *description* - karagdagang impormasyon tungkol sa utos
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ipinakikita lamang ito sa tuwing tinitignan ang impormasyon ng utos sa pamamagitan ng utos na `impormasyon`

		• **information <name>**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>nagpapakita ng impormasyon tungkol sa tinukoy na custom na utos
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>example: `renz impormasyon sheesh`
		**-** *name* - ang pangalan ng custom na utos na tatanggalin

		• **list**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>displays the names of all the tags in the current server

		• **remove <name>**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>magtanggal ng isang custom na utos
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang mga maaari lamang magtanggal ng isang custom na utos ay ang nagdagdag nito, at ang mga miyembro ng server na may `Permission.MANAGE_SERVER`
		**-** *pangalan* - ang pangalan ng custom na utos

		• **tag**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>the name of the tag to be used
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>example: `renz sheesh`

titobadang.name: titobadang
titobadang.description:
***DALAWANG BESES NA YAN*
shows a transcript of Tito Badang's infamous video**

trivia.name: trivia
trivia.description:
**gives a trivia that you can answer**
	<:Reply:986293903131050045>there are three trivia levels: `Easy`, `Average`, and `Difficult`

mathematics.name: mathematics
mathematics.options:
• **expression**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang ekspresyong pang-sipnayan na susuriin o lulutasin (example: `(pi)3^2`)

myanimelist.name: myanimelist
myanimelist.description: **searches MyAnimeList for an anime or manga**
myanimelist.options:
• **anime|manga**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>tinutukoy kung `anime` o `manga` ang hahanapin sa MyAnimeList
		• **search**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>maaring gamitin upang matukoy na nais mong ipakita ang mga nakalap na resulta sa pagsasaliksik, at pumili mula sa mga ito
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>kapag hindi ito ginamit, awtomatikong ipakikita ang unang resulta ng pagsasaliksik
		• **name**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang pangalan ng anime o manga na hahanapin sa myanimelist

nhentai.name: nhentai
nhentai.description: **searches NHentai for a gallery or comic**
nhentai.options:
• **ID**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang ID ng isang galerya sa NHentai (example: `272727`)
		• **"RANDOM"**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>nagsasaliksik para sa isang *random* na galerya sa NHentai
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ginagamit nito ang link na [`nhentai.net/random`](https://www.nhentai.net/random)

saucenao.name: saucenao
saucenao.description: **attempts to find the source of a given image**
saucenao.options:
• **image**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang link ng imaheng hahanapin ang pinagmulan
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>example: `https://cdn.discordapp.com/avatars/527828928803373065/4922081075ab7e2673f3b044b9e993c5.png?size=1024`
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>maaari ring i-attach sa mensahe ang imahe

translate.name: translate
translate.description: **translates a given message from one language to another**
translate.options:
• **from**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>the language of the original message
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>example: `TL` para sa wikang Tagalog
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>maaari mo ring ilagay ang `AUTO` upang hayaan ang bot na tukuyin ang wika ng iyong mensahe
		• **to**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>the language to which the original message will be translated to
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>example: `JA` para sa wikang Hapon
		• **message**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>the message to be translated to another language
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>hindi maaaring lumampas sa 500 karakter ang haba ng mensahe

wikipedia.name: wikipedia
wikipedia.description: searches Wikipedia for an article and displays the first result
wikipedia.options:
• **name**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>the name of the article to be search for in Wikipedia

back.name: back
back.description: **plays previous song or adds it to the back of queue (if the queue is not empty)**

lyrics.name: lyrics
lyrics.description:
**shows the lyrics of a song**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>maaari ring hayaang walang nakalagay upang hanapin ang lirika ng kasalukuyang tugtog
lyrics.options:
• **name**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang pangalan ng kanta na hahanapan ng lirika

nowplaying.name: nowplaying
nowplaying.description: shows the music that is currently playing

play.name: play
play.options:
• **"playlist"**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ilagay ang salitang "playlist" upang tukuyin kung playlist ang ipatutugtog
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>maaaring sumangguni sa utos na `mgaplaylist` para sa listahan ng mga playlist
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>hindi ito kailangang gamitin kung ang playlist na patutugtogin ay galing sa *YouTube* o iba pang panlabas na pinagmumulan
		• **namen**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang pangalan ng tugtog na patutugtogin
		• **URL**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang URL o *link* patungo sa tugtog na patutugtogin

playlist.name: playlist
playlist.description:
**commands for the management and usage of playlists
	!! These commands are currently under development. Please avoid using for now.**

queue.name: queue
queue.options:
• **page**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>the queue page (a maximum of 10 tracks can be shown for each page)

remove.name: remove
remove.options:
• **ALL**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>removes all the tracks that you have enqueued
		• **position**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>the position of the track to be removed from the queue

search.name: search
search.options:
• **query**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang pangalan ng tugtog na hahanapin sa *YouTube*

scsearch.name: scsearch
scsearch.description: **searches *SoundCloud* for a provided query and plays the first result**
scsearch.options:
• **query**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>ang pangalan ng tugtog na hahanapin sa SoundCloud*

seek.name: seek
seek.description: **jumps to the specified part or section of the current track**
seek.options:
• **+|-**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>maaaring gamitin upang tukuyin kung magdaragdag o magbabawas relatibo sa kasalukuyang posisyon ng tugtog
		• **HH:MM:SS**
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>eksaktong posisyon kung patungo saan lalaktaw
		<:Reply:986293903131050045>`HH` - Hours, `MM` - Minutes, `SS` - Seconds

shuffle.name: shuffle
shuffle.description: **shuffles the order of the tracks that you have added to the queue**

forceremove.name: forceremove
forceremove.description: **removes all entries of the specified user from the queue**

movetrack.name: movetrack
movetrack.description: **moves a track in the queue to another position**

playnext.name: playnext
playnext.description: **adds a song to the front of the queue**

repeat.name: repeat
repeat.description: re-adds music to the queue when finished

setfilter.name: setfilter
setfilter.description: allows or denies the usage of audio filters in the current server

skipto.name: skipto
skipto.description: **skips to the track at the specified queue position**

stop.name: stop
stop.description: **stops the current track, clears the queue, and leaves the voice channel**

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: **sets a server-specific prefix for the usage of bot commands**

setcompactmode.name: setcompactmode
setcompactmode.description: **shortens (or returns to normal) the messages sent when queuing tracks**

setdj.name: setdj
setdj.description:
**sets the DJ role, which will be given permission to use certain music commands**
	<:Reply:986293903131050045>kapag hindi ito itinakda, lahat ng miyembro sa server ay ituturing ng bot bilang DJ at bibigyan ng pantay-pantay na kapangyarihan sa pagpapatugtog

setgiveaway.name: setgiveaway
setgiveaway.description: **sets a server-specific role that will be notified whenever there is a new giveaway**

setlanguage.name: setlanguage
setlanguage.description: **sets the server-specific language to be used by the bot in its messages**

setskip.name: setskip
setskip.description: **sets the server-specific percentage of listeners that must agree before skipping a track**

setrestrictedtc.name: setrestrictedtc
setrestrictedtc.description: **sets a server-specific text channel wherein the usage of certain fun commands are forbidden**

settc.name: settc
settc.description: **sets the text channel for music-related commands**

setvc.name: setvc
setvc.description: **sets the voice channel for playing music**
